titleStmt.title: A briefe and true relation of the discouerie of the north part of Virginia being a most pleasant, fruitfull and commodious soile: made this present yeere 1602, by Captaine Bartholomew Gosnold, Captaine Bartholowmew [sic] Gilbert, and diuers other gentlemen their associats, by the permission of the honourable knight, Sir Walter Ralegh, &c. Written by M. Iohn Brereton one of the voyage. Whereunto is annexed a treatise, of M. Edward Hayes, conteining important inducements for the planting in those parts, and finding a passage that way to the South sea, and China.
titleStmt.author: Brereton, John, 1572-ca. 1619.
Hayes, Edward, fl. 1602.

editionStmt.edition: With diuers instructions of speciall moment newly added in this second impression.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Printed at Eliot's Court Press] impensis Geor. Bishop,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in: University of Michigan. Library.
